inclusion.criterion: Salmon and Durie criteria for initial diagnosis of multiple myeloma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Transplant will be offered to patients with stage II or III multiple myeloma (MM) at diagnosis or have received chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy for progressive MM after initial diagnosis of stage I disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient must have the capacity to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have received at least 4 cycles of conventional dose chemotherapy for MM
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: DONOR: Donor must consent to filgrastim (G-CSF) administration and leukapheresis for both peripheral blood stem cell (PBSC) allograft and subsequent DLI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: DONOR: Donor must have adequate veins for leukapheresis or agree to placement of central venous catheter (femoral, subclavian)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: DONOR: Age < 75, older donors may be considered after consultation by Psychological Consultation Center (PCC)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Karnofsky score less than 60, unless due solely to myeloma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Left ventricular ejection fraction less than 40%
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Bilirubin greater than 2 X the upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serum glutamic pyruvic transaminase (SGPT) and serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase (SGOT) > 2 X the upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diffusion lung capacity of carbon monoxide (DLCO) < 50% (corrected) or receiving continuous supplemental oxygen
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Seropositive for the human immunodeficiency virus
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and was admitted last week with hypercalcemia.
